title: Ketoh
description: Zuni; silver sheet mounting on leather band; set with channel and inlay designs of Moreci turquoises, Hopi sun in center consisting of red, black, white stones in a circle with 10 oval turquoise; 8 other groups of 4 turquoise. twisted wire and teardrop decoration;   J# 1039, Cat# 637 Illus p. 148
